summary: Set during the Tang Dynasty, The Robbers tells the story of two robbers' adventures in a seemingly peaceful Bitter Bamboo Village, where they encounter a beautiful woman, a group of soldiers and a village head scheming to kill the duo.
cast: Jun Hu|Wu Jiang|Xiao Wang|Li-Chun Lee|Sa Li|Jian Yin|Xiao-lei Yu|Huaichen Wang|Fengguo Xin|Tong Jia|Fang Song|Urina Gerel|Xu Wang|Yusuke Toyoumi|Yuuki Tomita|Zhong LÃ¼|Guanglong Zhu|Ya Gao|Shu-peng Yang|Hairui Yu|Yu Sha|Maggie Liu|Xuqin Yang|Hao Wang|Adam S. Shen
title: Wo de tangchao xiongdi
